segments.text: Hi . Can you give me a wake-up call tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . What time would you like us to call you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need two wake-up calls , if you don't mind , one at 7 and the other at 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not a problem . We'll call you tomorrow morning at 7 , and again at 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: On second thought , you'd better make that second call at 7 thirty instead of 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Said , and done . Will there be anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that gets it for now , thank you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , give us a call if there's anything more we can help you with .
segments.speaker: S2
